name: Mystic
description: The Mystic is a Medium humanoid creature wearing hide armor, with an exceptional knowledge of the arcane. It is not physically imposing but relies on cunning and magical abilities to manipulate combat.
memorable: The Mystic can command nearby entities to attack and possesses powerful abilities to survive lethal damage, making it a formidable opponent.
goals: To manipulate others and gain power through dark arcane knowledge.
relations: Might ally with fiends, elementals, or angels as commanded.
environment: Typically found in dark, arcane locales, often associated with planar travel.
strengths: High Intelligence boosts its spellcasting and tactical options, along with robust resistance to necrotic damage.
weaknesses: Relatively low physical strength and resilience against radiant damage.
attacks: It delivers slashing and necrotic damage through its multiattack with Void Claw and ranged assaults with Void Bolt.
most_powerful_ability: Unveil creates terror by revealing dark truths to multiple enemies at once.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, enabling it to see in dim light.
skills: Skilled in Arcana, Intimidation, and decent Perception, making it effective in knowledge-based and social encounters.
additional_information: Resilient against many spells due to Void Fortitude.
Levitation ability allows for vertical mobility in combat.
Planar Commander can unleash additional attacks from allies.
Has a strategic edge in battlefield manipulation.
test_queries: manipulative enemy that uses illusion magic
fight against a cunning necrotic creature
humanoid that levitates and causes fear
